definition: abbr. for Xinjiang 新疆[Xin1 jiang1] or Singapore 新加坡[Xin1 jia1 po1]/surname Xin
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
to substitute/to act on behalf of others/to replace/generation/dynasty/age/period/(historical) era/(geological) eon

sentences.english: Banks are not lining up to lend money on their own for construction of the newest generation of Indian Points.
sentences.chinese: 銀行不會自願貸款給新一代印點核電站的建造。

sentences.english: Ready to put him into a new generation of stars instead of Mollys article.
sentences.chinese: 準備把他捧成新一代的巨星代替莫利文。

sentences.english: Li Yuchun is a Chinese pop singer.
sentences.chinese: 李宇春，中國新一代流行歌手。

sentences.english: In cities, modules can be stacked to make a new generation of efficient buildings.
sentences.chinese: 城市裏，模型房能建造成片形成新一代的有效住房。

sentences.english: The third, Hubei Jiangguiying to a new generation of folk singers singing inspiration.
sentences.chinese: 蔣桂英湖北民歌演唱給新一代演唱者的啓示。

sentences.english: The new breed of statisticians tackle that problem.
sentences.chinese: 新一代的統計學家讓這一問題迎刃而解。

sentences.english: Star of securities by the introduction of a new generation of market analysis software.
sentences.chinese: 由證券之星推出的新一代行情分析軟件。

sentences.english: The singer is slated to be the new Bond girl.
sentences.chinese: 該名歌手被選定接演新一代龐德女郎。

sentences.english: After doing that, the new generation was selected by synthesizing roulette wheel and optimization selecting.
sentences.chinese: 再結合旋轉輪盤賭和最優化選擇新一代染色體。

sentences.english: The pressureless hot-water boilers pertain to a new generation of boilers developed in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 無壓熱水鍋爐是近年研製的新一代鍋爐。

sentences.english: It is the latest generation of orthopedic treater as designed and developed by our factory.
sentences.chinese: 經本廠多年研發推出的新一代的骨科治療產品。

sentences.english: The major design features of APCI industrial computer are presented.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了新一代APCI工業控制機的設計特點。

sentences.english: Electro - optic ( EO ) materials are a new class of information materials based on photonics.
sentences.chinese: 電光材料是以光子爲載體的新一代信息材料。

sentences.english: Instead of remaining silent, a new generation of authors has found its voice on the web.
sentences.chinese: 新一代作家紛紛不甘寂寞，在網絡上發出自己的聲音。

sentences.english: Optimizing Choice of Product Innovation Item Based on Genetic Evolution;
sentences.chinese: 再結合旋轉輪盤賭和最優化選擇新一代染色體。

sentences.english: Meguiar's new NXT GenerationTM Tech Wax is a completely new formula based upon cutting-edge polymer technology.
sentences.chinese: 美光的NXT新一代蠟王是聚合體技術的全新配方。

definition: Cenozoic (geological era covering the last 65m years)
secondary/twice in the year (of generations of insects, harvests etc)
to transition to a new dynasty or regime/to replace an older product with an upgraded, new-generation one
to confess one's crime/first model, version, kind etc (of gadgets, software, cars etc)
to substitute/to act on behalf of others/to replace/generation/dynasty/age/period/(historical) era/(geological) eon
